creator: Traplight Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
If you're looking for real mass battles, look no further! Battle Legion puts you in shoes of an aspiring commander, and as you rank up through unforgettable victories, so does your legion.

Design and tweak your army from dozens of unique units, ranging from classic sword and shield fighters to arcane wizardry, dark age machinery, and mythical creatures. Equip your troops with skills that match your masterplan, sit back, and watch how they fight pitted enemy legions to the death.



- BITESIZED COMBAT: battles last around 20 seconds
- LAID BACK GAMING: you plan the army layout, and they do the fighting
- AUTO-PLAY: your legion keeps fighting as you go about your daily business
- COSMETICS: choose what your units, battlefield, and banner looks like
- PLAYER BATTLES: Face other players in the battlefield and learn from their strategies



Battle Legion has an active Discord community where players discuss winning strategies, tips and development of the game — with devs frequently participating in the chat. As the game is currently in beta, your valuable feedback can affect its development now more than ever.

-------------

Discord: https://discord.gg/udksY6y
Privacy Policy: http://traplightgames.com/privacy-notice/
Terms of Service: http://traplightgames.com/terms-of-service/
descriptionShort: If you're looking for real mass battles, look no further!

title: Battle Legion - Auto Mass Battler

creator: Traplight Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Massive 100v100 Unit Battles - Build an army and watch it fight idle-style - Plenty of units and skins. Endless fun! Battle Legion puts you in shoes of an aspiring commander, and as you rank up through unforgettable victories, so does your legion.

Design and tweak your army from dozens of unique units, ranging from classic sword and shield fighters to arcane wizardry, dark age machinery, and mythical creatures. Equip your troops with Powers that match your masterplan, sit back, and watch how they fight pitted enemy legions to the bitter end.

- BITESIZED COMBAT: Battles last 20 seconds or less.
- LAID BACK GAMING: You plan the army layout, and they do the fighting.
- AUTO-PLAY: Your legion keeps fighting as you go about your daily business.
- COSMETICS: Choose what your units, battlefield, and banner looks like.
- PLAYER BATTLES: Face other players in the battlefield and learn from their strategies.
- POWER UP: Boost your units with dynamic seasonal Powers.
- REFRESHING SEASONS: New content introduced in bi-weekly Seasons, with fourth Season marking the dawn of a new Era.

Battle Legion has an active Discord community of over 10K members where players discuss winning strategies, tips and development of the game — with devs frequently participating in the chat. Weekly streams and community events hosted on Youtube!

-------------

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/BattleLegion

title: Battle Legion - Auto Mass Battler

creator: Traplight Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Massive 100v100 Unit Battles - Build an army and watch it fight idle-style - Plenty of units and skins. Endless fun! Battle Legion puts you in shoes of an aspiring commander, and as you rank up through unforgettable victories, so does your legion.

Design and tweak your army from dozens of unique units, ranging from classic sword and shield fighters to arcane wizardry, dark age machinery, and mythical creatures. Equip your troops with Powers that match your masterplan, sit back, and watch how they fight pitted enemy legions to the bitter end.

- BITESIZED COMBAT: Battles last 20 seconds or less.
- LAID BACK GAMING: You plan the army layout, and they do the fighting.
- AUTO-PLAY: Your legion keeps fighting as you go about your daily business.
- COSMETICS: Choose what your units, battlefield, and banner looks like.
- PLAYER BATTLES: Face other players in the battlefield and learn from their strategies.
- POWER UP: Boost your units with dynamic seasonal Powers.
- REFRESHING SEASONS: New content introduced in bi-weekly Seasons, with fourth Season marking the dawn of a new Era.

Battle Legion has an active Discord community of over 10K members where players discuss winning strategies, tips and development of the game — with devs frequently participating in the chat. Weekly streams and community events hosted on Youtube!

-------------

Discord: https://discord.gg/udksY6y
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/BattleLegion
Privacy Policy: http://traplightgames.com/privacy-notice/
Terms of Service: http://traplightgames.com/terms-of-service/
descriptionShort: Upgrade Units, Customise with Skins, Battle against Other Players & Clan Bosses

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Long-awaited ARTIFACTS are here! Time to RAID!

Boost your entire army with Artifacts earned from Clan Raids!
Easier Raids grant Common Artifacts while the more challenging Raids grant Rare Artifacts!
"Path of the Void Hunter" Quest added to acknowledge your Raid prowess!
The Great Plague has begun! New Powerstones and Season Pass cosmetics available!
See in-game News for full list of changes


Join Battle Legion Discord channel to discuss tactics with other players, and to talk with the devs.

Design and tweak your army from dozens of unique units, ranging from classic sword and shield fighters to arcane wizardry, dark age machinery, and mythical creatures. Equip your troops with Powers that match your masterplan, sit back, and watch how they fight pitted enemy legions to the bitter end.

- BITESIZED COMBAT: Battles last 20 seconds or less.
- LAID BACK GAMING: You plan the army layout, and they do the fighting.
- AUTO-PLAY: Your legion keeps fighting as you go about your daily business.
- COSMETICS: Choose what your units, battlefield, and banner looks like.
- PLAYER BATTLES: Face other players in the battlefield and learn from their strategies.
- POWER UP: Boost your units with dynamic seasonal Powers.
- REFRESHING SEASONS: New content introduced in bi-weekly Seasons, with fourth Season marking the dawn of a new Era.

Battle Legion has an active Discord community of over 10K members where players discuss winning strategies, tips and development of the game — with devs frequently participating in the chat. Weekly streams and community events hosted on Youtube!

-------------

Discord: https://discord.gg/udksY6y
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/BattleLegion
Privacy Policy: http://traplightgames.com/privacy-notice/
Terms of Service: http://traplightgames.com/terms-of-service/
descriptionShort: Upgrade Units, Customise with Skins, Battle against Other Players & Clan Bosses

title: Battle Legion - Auto Mass Battler

creator: Traplight Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Massive 100v100 Unit Battles - Build an army and watch it fight idle-style - Plenty of units and skins. Endless fun! Battle Legion puts you in shoes of an aspiring commander, and as you rank up through unforgettable victories, so does your legion.

Design and tweak your army from dozens of unique units, ranging from classic sword and shield fighters to arcane wizardry, dark age machinery, and mythical creatures. title: Battle Legion - Auto Mass Battler

creator: Traplight Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Massive 100v100 Unit Battles - Build an army and watch it fight idle-style - Plenty of units and skins. Endless fun! Battle Legion puts you in shoes of an aspiring commander, and as you rank up through unforgettable victories, so does your legion.

Design and tweak your army from dozens of unique units, ranging from classic sword and shield fighters to arcane wizardry, dark age machinery, and mythical creatures. Equip your troops with Powers that match your masterplan, sit back, and watch how they fight pitted enemy legions to the bitter end.

- BITESIZED COMBAT: Battles last 20 seconds or less.
- LAID BACK GAMING: You plan the army layout, and they do the fighting.
- AUTO-PLAY: Your legion keeps fighting as you go about your daily business.
- COSMETICS: Choose what your units, battlefield, and banner looks like.
- PLAYER BATTLES: Face other players in the battlefield and learn from their strategies.
- POWER UP: Boost your units with dynamic seasonal Powers.
- REFRESHING SEASONS: New content introduced in bi-weekly Seasons, with fourth Season marking the dawn of a new Era.

Battle Legion has an active Discord community of over 10K members where players discuss winning strategies, tips and development of the game — with devs frequently participating in the chat. Weekly streams and community events hosted on Youtube!

-------------

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/S5Kfx2N2cK
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/BattleLegion
Privacy Policy: http://traplightgames.com/privacy-notice/
Terms of Service: http://traplightgames.com/terms-of-service/
descriptionShort: Upgrade Units, Customise with Skins, Battle against Other Players & Clan Bosses

Massive 100v100 Unit Battles - Build an army and watch it fight idle-style - Plenty of units and skins. Endless fun! Battle Legion puts you in shoes of an aspiring commander, and as you rank up through unforgettable victories, so does your legion.

Design and tweak your army from dozens of unique units, ranging from classic sword and shield fighters to arcane wizardry, dark age machinery, and mythical creatures. Equip your troops with Powers that match your masterplan, sit back, and watch how they fight pitted enemy legions to the bitter end.

- BITESIZED COMBAT: Battles last 20 seconds or less.
- LAID BACK GAMING: You plan the army layout, and they do the fighting.
- AUTO-PLAY: Your legion keeps fighting as you go about your daily business.
- COSMETICS: Choose what your units, battlefield, and banner looks like.
- PLAYER BATTLES: Face other players in the battlefield and learn from their strategies.
- POWER UP: Boost your units with dynamic seasonal Powers.
- REFRESHING SEASONS: New content introduced in bi-weekly Seasons, with fourth Season marking the dawn of a new Era.

Battle Legion has an active Discord community of over 10K members where players discuss winning strategies, tips and development of the game — with devs frequently participating in the chat. Weekly streams and community events hosted on Youtube!

-------------

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/S5Kfx2N2cK
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/BattleLegion
Privacy Policy: http://traplightgames.com/privacy-notice/
Terms of Service: http://traplightgames.com/terms-of-service/
descriptionShort: Upgrade Units, Customise with Skins, Battle against Other Players & Clan Bosses

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Season 3 of Fury of the Elements begins soon, get ready!

* NEW POWERSTONES: Reflect melee damage with ”Thorns” or teleport around the field with ”Time Warp”!
* New Premium Cosmetic for Windreaver!
* And much more! See in-game news for the full list of changes

Join Battle Legion Discord channel to discuss tactics with other players, and to talk with the devs.

And with regular updates and new content being added all the time, there's always something new to discover in the brawl war world of Battle Legion's battlefields.

If you're looking for an army building game with tons of awesome characters and strategy legends to recruit, epic war battles against huge monsters and creatures, and immersive clash gameplay, you've found it! With an exciting visual style, responsive combat controls, customizable strategy crafting and engaging raid royale brawl gameplay, Battle Legion is sure to provide hours of entertainment for clan warriors of all levels who want to royale raid, clash, hack and slash at epic enemies, monsters and creatures worthy of legends!

Battle Legion has an active and EPIC Discord clan of over 10K warriors where players discuss winning strategies, tips and development of the game — with devs frequently participating in the chat. Weekly streams and community events hosted on Youtube! Join the clan!

title:
Battle Legion - Mass Battler
3.5.7

container.value:
GodSpeed Games
World Trade Center, Tower-1
Office 610, Kharadi
Pune-411014
Maharashtra, INDIA

creator: GODSPEED GAMES
descriptionHtml:
Massive 100v100 Unit Battles - Build an army and watch your troops fight idle-style. Plenty of units and skins ensure endless fun at the top of mobile gaming experiences. Battle Legion places you at the top tier of aspiring commanders, and as you rank up through unforgettable victories, so do your legion and its troops.

Design and tweak your army from dozens of unique units, turning your troops into top sword and shield fighters, practitioners of arcane wizardry, users of dark age machinery, and mythical creatures. Equip your troops with Powers that match your masterplan, then sit back and watch how they fight against pitted enemy legions until the bitter end.

- BITESIZED COMBAT: Battles with your troops last 20 seconds or less.
- LAID BACK GAMING: You plan the army layout for your troops, and they handle the fighting.
- AUTO-PLAY: Your troops keep engaging enemy monsters and creatures even when you're busy.
- COSMETICS: Choose how your warriors, battlefield, banner, and troops appear in battle. Stand out at the top with unique cosmetic choices.
- PLAYER BATTLES: See how your troops fare against other top players' warriors on the battlefield and learn from their strategies.
- POWER UP: Boost your troops with dynamic seasonal Powers.
- REFRESHING SEASONS: Every Season introduces new content, with the fourth marking the dawn of a new Era. Witness the legends your troops become on the battlefield!

Take control of your war royale brawl clan army, tweaking your epic raid strategy to best utilize your troops and their unique skills. Focus on ranged raid attacks, heavy artillery, or up-close war and royale clash combat. In every clash, your troops have the potential to hack, slash, and brawl against epic enemy warriors, monsters, and creatures, becoming stuff of legends.

Jump right into the battle royale of war brawl action against epic monsters and creatures, and start building your fight clan army of legends. Dive into easy-to-learn clash raid combat mechanics, and ensure your troops are always ready for the next battle. With updates and new content, there's always a new challenge waiting for your troops in the war world of Battle Legion's battlefields.

If you're searching for a top army building game full of fantastic characters, epic war battles, and immersive clash gameplay, you've found it! Battle Legion provides hours of entertainment for warriors of all levels. Ready your troops and raid, clash, hack, and slash against formidable enemies!

Battle Legion boasts an active and EPIC Discord clan of over 10K warriors, where players discuss winning strategies, troops' strengths, tips, and the game's development—with devs actively participating. Weekly streams and community events are hosted on Youtube! Join the clan!

-------------

Discord: https://discord.gg/zWBtrvWSaz
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/BattleLegion
Privacy Policy: https://godspeedgames.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Service: https://godspeedgames.com/terms-and-conditions/
descriptionShort: Upgrade Units, Customise with Skins, Battle against Other Players & Clan Bosses

Battle Legion places you at the top tier of aspiring commanders, and as you rank up through unforgettable victories, so do your legion and its troops.

Design and tweak your army from dozens of unique units, turning your troops into top sword and shield fighters, practitioners of arcane wizardry, users of dark age machinery, and mythical creatures. Equip your troops with Powers that match your masterplan, then sit back and watch how they fight against pitted enemy legions until the bitter end.

- BITESIZED COMBAT: Battles with your troops last 20 seconds or less.
- LAID BACK GAMING: You plan the army layout for your troops, and they handle the fighting.
- AUTO-PLAY: Your troops keep engaging enemy monsters and creatures even when you're busy.
- COSMETICS: Choose how your warriors, battlefield, banner, and troops appear in battle. Stand out at the top with unique cosmetic choices.
- PLAYER BATTLES: See how your troops fare against other top players' warriors on the battlefield and learn from their strategies.
- POWER UP: Boost your troops with dynamic seasonal Powers.
- REFRESHING SEASONS: Every Season introduces new content, with the fourth marking the dawn of a new Era. Witness the legends your troops become on the battlefield!

Take control of your war royale brawl clan army, tweaking your epic raid strategy to best utilize your troops and their unique skills. Focus on ranged raid attacks, heavy artillery, or up-close war and royale clash combat. In every clash, your troops have the potential to hack, slash, and brawl against epic enemy warriors, monsters, and creatures, becoming stuff of legends.

Jump right into the battle royale of war brawl action against epic monsters and creatures, and start building your fight clan army of legends. Dive into easy-to-learn clash raid combat mechanics, and ensure your troops are always ready for the next battle. With updates and new content, there's always a new challenge waiting for your troops in the war world of Battle Legion's battlefields.

If you're searching for a top army building game full of fantastic characters, epic war battles, and immersive clash gameplay, you've found it! Battle Legion provides hours of entertainment for warriors of all levels. Ready your troops and raid, clash, hack, and slash against formidable enemies!

Battle Legion boasts an active and EPIC Discord clan of over 10K warriors, where players discuss winning strategies, troops' strengths, tips, and the game's development—with devs actively participating. Weekly streams and community events are hosted on Youtube! Join the clan!

-------------

Jump right into the battle royale of war brawl action against epic monsters and creatures, and start building your fight clan army of legends. Dive into easy-to-learn clash raid combat mechanics, and ensure your troops are always ready for the next battle. With updates and new content, there's always a new challenge waiting for your troops in the war world of Battle Legion's battlefields.

If you're searching for a top army building game full of fantastic characters, epic war battles, and immersive clash gameplay, you've found it! Battle Legion provides hours of entertainment for warriors of all levels. Ready your troops and raid, clash, hack, and slash against formidable enemies!

Battle Legion boasts an active and EPIC Discord clan of over 10K warriors, where players discuss winning strategies, troops' strengths, tips, and the game's development—with devs actively participating. Weekly streams and community events are hosted on Youtube! Join the clan!

descriptionHtml:

Battle Legion places you at the top tier of aspiring commanders, and as you rank up through unforgettable victories, so do your legion and its troops.

Design and tweak your army from dozens of unique units, turning your troops into top sword and shield fighters, practitioners of arcane wizardry, users of dark age machinery, and mythical creatures. Equip your troops with Powers that match your masterplan, then sit back and watch how they fight against pitted enemy legions until the bitter end.

- BITESIZED COMBAT: Battles with your troops last 20 seconds or less.
- LAID BACK GAMING: You plan the army layout for your troops, and they handle the fighting.
- AUTO-PLAY: Your troops keep engaging enemy monsters and creatures even when you're busy.
- COSMETICS: Choose how your warriors, battlefield, banner, and troops appear in battle. Stand out at the top with unique cosmetic choices.
- PLAYER BATTLES: See how your troops fare against other top players' warriors on the battlefield and learn from their strategies.
- POWER UP: Boost your troops with dynamic seasonal Powers.
- REFRESHING SEASONS: Every Season introduces new content, with the fourth marking the dawn of a new Era. Witness the legends your troops become on the battlefield!
